lead_paragraph: Four sites in Jamaica, Queens, were firebombed Sunday night by an attacker who favored Starbucks Frappucino bottles filled with flammable liquid. The attacker, who has not been captured, targeted an Islamic center, a bodega owned by a Muslim man, the home of a Hindu priest which had a shrine in its window and the home of residents who said they were Christian.

headline.main: Islamic Center, Hindu Priest's Home Targeted in New York
